name: Just Like That
content: I know it's been a while
And I don't want to do this
How we used to be  yeah
I don't know what I was thinking
But I know you put a hold on me
You stole my heart and you broke in
你偷走了我的心让其碎裂
You broke me down and I gave in
Me in you push me out again
I'm on into just like that
I think you better run away fast
我认为你最好尽快逃离
我会就这样 会这样爱上你爱上你
Cause I'mma do you just like
You say you need to talk
你说你需要倾诉那般对你
Because you really miss me oh oh
You own my heart and you know it
你拥有我的心 你知道的
Fueled in the flame I'm burning
You break me down and I give in
Every single time you pull me
In you push me out again
I'm on into just like that
I think you better run away fast
我认为你最好尽快逃离
我会就这样 会这样爱上你爱上你
我会就这样 会这样爱上你
我会就这样 会这样爱上你
Cause I'mma do you just like
因为我会就这样 会这样爱上你
我永远不会再次陷入爱情
Every single time you pull me
In you push me out again
Pull me in you push me out again
So I'mma do you just like that
我会就这样 会这样爱上你
Cause I can't do it just like that
So when you see me  I think
我觉得你最好尽快逃离
Cause I'mma do you just like that
因为 会这样爱上你
